Now it is your turn, set your weight preferences and select an area to display the average scores.

[**Remember**]{.underline}**:** darker areas correspond to a score closer to 1, representing a higher concentration of the displayed resources. On the contrary, those areas in white show a deficit or an absolute lack of them.
